entry.summary: In a message sent on December 28, 2014, Mike Hearn expressed concerns over the limitations of DNS as a protocol for learning about the p2p network. It is widely used on the internet to provide users with a way to access websites using easy-to-remember domain names, rather than the more complex IP addresses.
